abstract: World markets dropped Wednesday, led by a near 3 percent tumble in Shanghai’s stock benchmark, as investors fretted about new curbs on the lavish bank lending that has driven China’s economic revival.
snippet: World markets dropped Wednesday, led by a near 3 percent tumble in Shanghai’s stock benchmark, as investors fretted about new curbs on the lavish bank lending that has driven China’s economic revival.
lead_paragraph: World markets dropped Wednesday, led by a near 3 percent tumble in Shanghai’s stock benchmark, as investors fretted about new curbs on the lavish bank lending that has driven China’s economic revival.

headline.main: World Stocks Fall Amid Fears of China Bank Curbs

abstract: Bank of America will likely post another loss when it reports fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as banks continue to grapple with their problem loans and a weak economy.
snippet: Bank of America will likely post another loss when it reports fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as banks continue to grapple with their problem loans and a weak economy.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America likely will post another loss when it reports fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as banks continue to grapple with their problems loans and a weak economy, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Analysts Expect 4th Quarter Loss for BofA
